select qa.answer_id,que.question_date as date_order,count(qa.user_id) as count_order, que.question_contents,que.goods_id,ans.answer_contents from answer as ans join questions as que on ans.question_id=que.question_id join qa_like as qa on qa.answer_id=ans.answer_id where que.goods_id=#{goodsId} group by qa.answer_id
order by count_order
order by date_order
limit #{limitstart},#{count};
